column1: Uchi////Also our server was super friendly and helpful
column2: I didn't catch his name but on the ticket it says Steven. He was very knowledgeable
column3: and he was giving us suggestion on food. I didn't know this
column4: but we should have figure out what we wanted to eat from the beginning. He mention that the next time we come
column5: we should mention all the dishes and the server should know which plate to come out first to the last dish. Each dish suppose to built upon each other to give you a different taste bud explosion. Our server even came around before putting the order in for the foie gras nigiri
column6: if we wanted anything else because foie gras is so strong
column7: it should be the last dish before the dessert.
